description: This aromatic lemon and fennel fish stew is best served with plenty of crusty bread to mop up the sauce.
name: Lemon & Fennel Fish Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 fennel bulb, finely sliced, fronds reserved

recipeInstructions.text: In a large, deep pan on medium high heat, heat half the oil and cook the leeks and fennel for 6-7 minutes until soft and lightly golden. Add the garlic and fennel seeds and cook for 1 minute.

Pour over the wine and let it bubble and reduce for 1 minute, then add the chopped tomatoes, 100ml of water and half the lemon juice and zest. Reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes with the lid on to reduce and thicken the sauce.
Stir in the frozen fish mix and the spinach and cook for 5 minutes until heated through.
Serve with cracked black pepper, fennel fronds and lemon zest on top with crusty bread on the side.
